issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: Basically we recalculate the weight every time, even if the inputs did not change. This causes high cpu usage, if the cluster has lots of apps.
fields.summary: FairScheduler.update can take long time if yarn.scheduler.fair.sizebasedweight is on

Thank you for the review [~wilfreds]. I updated the patch. I could imagine certain scenarios, where the lock might be needed but I reordered the assignments to reduce the overhead and the impact of potential issues.
